result.title: Weapon Mod Pack
result.description:
People Playground weapons ModPack by: @ImGuHH

Contains:
• 4 cannons
• 12 melee weapons
• 1 Machine Gun with 2 parts
• 38 ranged weapons,
• Totaling 56 weapons (Almost all of the people playground ),

result.title: Terraria's Murasama
result.description:
Terraria's Murasama

Sam's Sword from Gost Runner
• The version from the mod on Terraria
• There's a closed and an open one.
• The open one has Glow.
• If you want the sword to be a weapon and not a decoration and take it in your hand then shrink it.

result.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R!
result.description:
Pack of weapons from the S.T.A.L.K.E.R!

Notes:
• 16 different weapons and 1 knife
• not fire

result.title: Hotline Miami Weapon Pack
result.description:
The mod adds quite a few edged weapons from the game Hotline Miami to the game.

To play comfortably, you need to disable collision at the item, attach a knife to it and enjoy Hotline Miami.

result.title: Block Strike
result.description:
Pack of weapons from "Block Strike"

• Glock pistol, skin - "galactik" 
• Boyanet, skin - "space range"
• Aka-47
• There is a glow texture
• Parts are somewhere metal, somewhere made of iron

result.title: Ice Cannons
result.description:
Ice cannons

1. Ice cannon 00 (large)
2. Ice cannon 01 (smaller)
3. The projectile

• Shoot by pressing the lever
• 00 has a grenade launcher and a thermal imager (for oriented in the dark)
• Shoot mini staffs
• Really freeze
• Huge radius of destruction
• Additional damage (tearing of the torso' hands)
• Heavy, difficult to give melon

result.title: Gan Pack
result.description:
A small pack of weapons (They shoot) 

The package includes:
• Rifle
• Rocket launcher
• Grenade Launcher
• Gun
• Revolver-based rifle
